#summary The font property is a shorthand property for setting 'font-style', 'font-variant', 'font-weight', 'font-size', 'line-height' and 'font-family'.
#labels about-css,is-css-property,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [CSSReference CSS Reference] > [CSSProperties Properties] > *font*

== Usage ==

== Values ==

  * `[ [ 'font-style' || 'font-variant' || 'font-weight' ]? 'font-size' [ / 'line-height' ]? 'font-family' ]`
  * `caption`
  * `icon`
